page.title: 18OVER WYRESDALE:ACTIVITIES
page.content: "One could be out almost every evening doing something if one had not to be up early next morning". Darts,snooker, billiards and dominoes are played at the Men's Club in Abbeystead and bowls and badminton by both men and women in Dolphinholme. Both villages have Womens' Institutes. Most women here go to Abbeystead W.I. but also to events and outings run by Dolphinholme W.I. Country Dancing classes are held at Abbeystead but fund raising dances at Dolphinholme New Hall. Field Days are well-attended annual events in both villages as is the Horticultural and Livestock Show at Abbeystead. Outings and other activities are run for young children belonging to the Adventurers' Club. Local Conservatives meet at Lentworth Farm. Some people here are also members of the Young Farmers' Club and the British Friesian Society.
